instructions: Open the Oculus app on your phone. Select Settings . Select your Oculus Quest . This should trigger it to pair your phone and device if they aren't paired already. Updating Oculus Quest from phone Source: Android Central Tap More Settings . Tap Advanced Settings . Toggle on the switch to Update Software Automatically .

Open the Oculus app on your phone. Select Settings . Select your Oculus Quest . This should trigger it to pair your phone and device if they aren't paired already. Tap More Settings . Tap About This Headset .
